code: 'use client';import React,{useEffect,useLayoutEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){function loadBackgroudImages(){let backgroudImages=document.querySelectorAll('[data-background]');if(backgroudImages.length>0){backgroudImages.forEach(element=>{let image=element.dataset.background;element.style.backgroundImage="url('".concat(image,"')");});}}useEffect(()=>{loadBackgroudImages();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:" page-header bg-img section-padding valign","data-background":"/assets/imgs/background/bg4.jpg","data-overlay-dark":"8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container pt-80",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-u ls1 fz-80",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"fw-200",children:"Masonry"})})})})})})});}export default Header;
